user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable, durable clothing that would withstand regular use and washing.
purchase_reason: I was looking for a comfortable and breathable t-shirt for casual wear. However, I was disappointed with the material's thinness and the fact that it shrank after washing, which did not meet my expectations for quality and durability.

I wanted a soft and comfortable t-shirt that would last longer than other brands. The positive feedback about its thickness and softness compared to competitors influenced my decision, as I was looking for a balance of quality and affordability.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are well-constructed and durable, with a focus on comfort and quality. I value items that fit well and are made from breathable materials, as well as those that offer good support and functionality. I appreciate when products are designed with customer feedback in mind, ensuring a better fit and overall experience. On the other hand, I tend to dislike items that have poor quality control, such as those with loose threads or thin materials that do not hold up well over time. I also find it frustrating when products do not fit as expected or are made from stiff materials that lack comfort.

conversation.content: I want recommendations for comfortable and durable clothing that can handle regular use and washing. within my expected price range: [12.7, 21.99]
What specific types of clothing are you looking for, such as t-shirts, pants, or jackets, to ensure the recommendations match your needs accurately?
I need "Clothing Shoes & Jewelry" category products. ["Clothing Shoes & Jewelry", "Men", "Clothing", "Shirts", "T-Shirts"]
What do you prefer in terms of fabric material for the t-shirts, such as cotton, polyester, or a blend, to better tailor the recommendations to your liking?
I prefer t-shirts made from breathable materials like cotton or a soft cotton blend for comfort and durability.

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <X RAY Men's Stretch Soft Cotton Slim Fit Short Sleeve Crewneck T-Shirt, Fashion Casual Tee for Men> / Item ID: B0C3WM79M5 / Price: $16.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Shirts', 'T-Shirts'] / Description: ['Crafted from high quality breathable cotton shirts for men blend, this must-have solid color crewneck t shirts for men offers a perfect casual classic style with ultimate comfort. Great for everyday wear - indoor or outdoor activities, workout at gym, lounging at home, strolling in summer. Can be worn alone or layering up for some extra style. Lightweight, classic slim fit, stretch cotton fabric ensures no pulling when a bit tight. Reinforced double stitched sleeve and hem for extra duribility. Fabric will stay strong even after many washes. Available many sizes and colors to choose from. PLEASE NOTE : This is stretch slim fit T-shirt. For your comfort & regular fit look, we recommend buying a size up.'] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Men's Essentials Long-Sleeve T-Shirt, Crewneck Cotton T-Shirts for Men, 2-Pack> / Item ID: B0C1CT3XJX / Price: $15.4 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Shirts', 'T-Shirts'] / Description: ["Hanes Essentials long sleeve t-shirts for men are crafted for quality and designed for comfort. Made from 100% cotton, this men’s t-shirt features ribbing at the cuffs and collar for that timeless crewneck tee style you love. Sturdy details like double-needle stitching and shoulder-to-shoulder taping make this long sleeve tee a wardrobe essential you can depend upon. Available in a handy 2-pack, it's perfect to pair with jeans, shorts, or your best Hanes joggers. Wear it as a bottom layer or as your only layer. You can't go wrong with our cotton classics."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Gildan Adult Softstyle Cotton T-Shirt, Style G64000, Multipack> / Item ID: B0C3FFHLVL / Price: $16.3 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Shirts', 'T-Shirts'] / Description: ['Gildan’s Adult Softstyle Cotton Tee G64000 has the perfect combination of softness and durability to ensure it stands the test of time. Made of 100% ring spun cotton with a modern classic cut, it’s perfect for lounging on the couch or going to a movie. Its soft smooth fabric is perfect for screen printing, embroidery, DTG, bleaching and tie dyeing.']
